title:
An integral over $(0,\pi)$ for the distribution function of a sum of
  independent gamma random variables and for quadratic forms of Gaussian
  variables
abstract:
An integral over the interval $(0,\pi)$ is given for the cumulative
distribution function of a sum of independent gamma random variables with
different scale and shape parameters. The cumulative distribution function of a
positive definite quadratic form is obtained as a special case with identical
shape parameters $\alpha = 1/2$.
